title: Jones Motorbikes Plus LWB HD/e complete bikes w/ Bafang motors are available now
content:
It’s just over a month since Jeff Jones first teased us with promise of a DIY eBike frameset for almost every type of riding there is. Now, he’s ready to show his hand, releasing the Jones Plus LWB HD/e frameset as well as two complete Bafang mid-drive motor-rocking ebikes. Here’s a quick overview. Jones Plus […]

The post Jones Motorbikes Plus LWB HD/e complete bikes w/ Bafang motors are available now appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
